definition: to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
to elaborate (on a theme)/to expound (the classics)/perfunctory/to skimp/to botch/to do sth half-heartedly or just for show/barely enough to get by
income does not cover expenditure/unable to make ends meet
to skimp/to work half-heartedly/not to bother
to skimp on the job/to work half-heartedly/not to take the job seriously
to smear/to apply glue or ointment to a surface
to give an orderly account/a thorough narrative
Kurashiki, city in Okayama Prefecture 岡山縣|冈山县[Gang1 shan1 xian4], Japan

sentences.english: After one night over ice compress, I found my leg felt much more better.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个晚上的冰敷，我发现我的脚感觉好多了。

sentences.english: And in my memory, when athlete was got hurt, they used to ice compress at first.
sentences.chinese: 而且在我记忆中，当运动员受伤后，他们都是先冰敷。

sentences.english: With gauze dipped in some yogurt, deposited in the eye around every ten minutes.
sentences.chinese: 用纱布蘸上些酸奶，敷在眼睛周围，每次十分钟。

sentences.english: External use: use accordingly for washing with decoction or make into powder and use as paste.
sentences.chinese: 外用适量，常用来煎汤熏洗，或研末调敷。

sentences.english: Apply a small amount of cream or ointment and rub it in gently.
Put a piece of dry clean cloth over the area of the burn.
sentences.chinese: 然后在受伤的地方敷一块干布。

sentences.english: Apply ice and visit your doctor if the pain doesn't go away after a few days.
sentences.chinese: 如果疼痛持续数天则要用冰敷并看医生。

sentences.english: We trust that the goods will reach you in time to meet your urgent need.
sentences.chinese: 我们相信货物会及时到达你方以敷急需。

sentences.english: Please use extra sheet of paper should this form not provide enough space for recording.
sentences.chinese: 本表各栏不敷使用时，请另加纸填写。

sentences.english: Apply cool running water or wet compresses as soon as possible, continuing until the pain subsides.
sentences.chinese: 尽快用流动的冷水冲或用湿布敷，直到疼痛减轻。

sentences.english: Use separate sheets if space in the form is not sufficient.
sentences.chinese: 如本表空格不敷应用，请另用纸张填写。

sentences.english: But for Erhard, that was not enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是对埃哈德来说，这还不敷。

sentences.english: After your tea bagging session, put them back in the freezer for the next run.
sentences.chinese: 茶叶袋敷完后再把它放回冰箱给下次用。

sentences.english: They can be applied thinly or thickly.
sentences.chinese: 它可以薄敷，也可以厚涂。

sentences.english: You might want to put some ice on that wrist.
sentences.chinese: 你也许得在手腕上敷一些冰。

sentences.english: She made up a medicine from the juice of herbs and applied it to the wound.
sentences.chinese: 她用几种草药的鲜汁配成药，把它敷在伤口上。

definition: to apply (ointment, powder)/to smear/to paint on
to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
